competitors.name: SAP
competitors.notes: Ordered to pay Oracle $1.3B for copyright infringement Nov 2010

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Enterprise technology and cloud computing competitor

competitors.name: Salesforce
competitors.notes: CRM leader with 21.9% market share vs Oracle's 5%

context: Transformational year: Oracle acquired Sun Microsystems for $7B+, becoming software and hardware company. SAP ordered to pay $1.3B for copyright infringement.
